Literature.Title: Effects of net charge and the number of positively charged residues on the biological activity of amphipathic alpha-helical cationic antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Jiang Z, Vasil AI, Hale JD, Hancock RE, Vasil ML, Hodges RS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAK(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CP204(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa WR5(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M2(MIC=>500.0µg/ml)
